summary: Execute a signed, multi-steward reconciliation pilot

steps.title: Collect steward node snapshots and keys
steps.notes: Staged steward-alpha/beta snapshots under artifacts/decentralized/live-run with copied anchors/capsule hashes and registered Ed25519 verification keys; captured manifest in nodes.json.

steps.title: Capture signed systemic receipts per node
steps.notes: Issued shared systemic anchor receipt signed with steward-alpha-2025 key and distributed it to both nodes for reconciliation.

steps.title: Run receipt_sync with signature enforcement
steps.notes: Executed python3 -m tools.network.receipt_sync --config _plans/2025-10-17-decentralized-live-run.config.json with signature enforcement and anchor/capsule verification.

steps.title: Publish results and resolve conflicts
steps.notes: Published zero-conflict summary for the live run and confirmed readiness to scale decentralized reconciliation.

checkpoint.description: Signed, multi-steward reconciliation completes with actionable outputs

priority.reason: Validates decentralized operation across live stewards with signed evidence.
